    About
  • Autodesk Alias is an industry-leading 3D CAD software that empowers designers to create high-quality, manufacturable surfaces. I had the privilege of designing the user experience for the SubD toolset within Alias. My work ensured seamless integration with the existing NURBS tools, making the entire design process more efficient and intuitive.
  • Thanks to these tools, new users can produce 3D models that can be refined and reworked by more experienced users without ever exporting anything, or compromising on quality.
